mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_schedule ( schedule_no, schedule_startTime, screen_totalseat, screen_restSeat, movie_no, screen_no, schedule_finishTime ) VALUES ( movie_schedule_seq.nextval, #{scheduleStartTime}, #{screenTotalSeat}, #{screenTotalSeat}, #{movieNo}, #{screenNo}, #{scheduleFinishTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE movie_schedule ms SET ms.schedule_startTime = #{scheduleStartTime}, ms.screen_totalseat = #{screenTotalSeat}, ms.screen_restSeat = #{screenRestSeat}, ms.movie_no = #{movieNo}, ms.screen_no = #{screenNo}, ms.schedule_finishTime = #{scheduleStartTime} + (SELECT (INTERVAL '1' MINUTE * movie_playTime) FROM movie WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo}) WHERE ms.schedule_no = #{scheduleNo} AND ms.movie_no = #{movieNo}
